_header: All the words that drawen to sin / Think that venom is therein
_description: A couplet translating ‘Omne seminarium voluptatis venenum puta’ in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Alle þe wordis þat drawen to senneþenk þat wenym
                    is þerinne
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 3.
